responsibilities: Own the development of new customer-facing ChatGPT and OpenAI API features and product experiences end-to-end
Talk to users to understand their problems and design solutions to address them
Collaborate with a cross-functional team of engineers, researchers, product managers, designers, and operations folks to create cutting-edge products
Optimize applications for speed and scale
Create a diverse and inclusive culture that makes all feel welcome
qualifications: Proficiency with Python, JavaScript, React, and some backend languages
Some experience with relational databases like Postgres/MySQL
Interest in AI/ML (direct experience not required)
Ability to move fast in an environment where things are sometimes loosely defined and may have competing priorities or deadlines
analysis: The job responsibilities include owning the development of new customer-facing ChatGPT and OpenAI API features and product experiences. ChatGPT is a well-known language model developed by OpenAI, which indicates that the job involves working with language models. Additionally, the mention of OpenAI API features further suggests involvement with Generative AI technologies. The skills section mentions an interest in AI/ML, which aligns with working in the field of Generative AI or language models. Overall, the responsibilities and skills clearly indicate that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
